```{r}
bay_county_names <-
  c(
    "Alameda",
    "Contra Costa",
    "Marin",
    "Napa",
    "San Francisco",
    "San Mateo",
    "Santa Clara",
    "Solano",
    "Sonoma"
  )

bay_counties <-
  counties("CA", cb = T, progress_bar = F) %>%
  filter(NAME %in% bay_county_names)


usa_zips <- 
  zctas(cb = T, progress_bar = F)

bay_zips <-
  usa_zips %>% 
  st_centroid() %>% 
  .[bay_counties, ] %>% 
  st_drop_geometry() %>% 
  left_join(usa_zips %>% select(GEOID10)) %>% 
  st_as_sf()

saveRDS(bay_zips, file= "bay_zips.rds")
```
